tidbits.title: Pioneering Eco-Tourism
tidbits.description: Costa Rica is a pioneer in eco-tourism, known for its abundant biodiversity, lush rainforests, and commitment to sustainability and conservation.

tidbits.title: Peaceful Nation
tidbits.description: Costa Rica abolished its army in 1949 and remains a peaceful nation, focusing resources on education, healthcare, and preserving its natural heritage.

tidbits.title: Adventure Paradise
tidbits.description: The country offers thrilling adventures, from zip-lining through forests and exploring volcanoes to surfing along the Pacific and Caribbean coasts.
